1400.name: Unknown
1400.message:
There is a problem with the disc drive.

For help, make a note of the error code and visit
support.nintendo.com.
1400.long_description: Optical Disc Drive error - Likely an issue with the Common Mode Filter.
1400.short_solution: To fix this requires soldering. Visit the support page for more information.
1400.long_solution: To fix this requires soldering. See https://gbatemp.net/threads/572879/ for more. (Thanks, Homebrew Discord. Speak to them for further assistance.)
